name: BROKEN HORIZONS (Alpha)
description:
Broken Horizons is a game where the dynamics vary with each level you reach!

Play in simple platform levels until you play levels where you will have to dodge objects, and among more things.

Content:
- 5 Levels
- 1 World
- 10 unlockable characters
- Store

At the moment this version will only be available in Spanish but we will do our best to bring more languages into the game soon.

NOTE: This version for now remains in alpha version. The game will improve as time progresses. The final version will be published until February 2021. Your support in the game would help us a lot to improve the development.
